metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14719 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
Before version 4.8.2, WordPress was vulnerable to a directory traversalattack during unzip operations in the ZipArchive and PclZip components.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-14719` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 4.8.2+dfsg-1
wordpress-l10n - 4.8.2+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentynineteen - 4.8.2+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentyseventeen - 4.8.2+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentysixteen - 4.8.2+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.8.2+dfsg-1').
